about_the_game:
Help Jun, a described "chronic over-thinker" make decisions at his new school with friends, conflicts, and romance
in this Shounen-ai, anime style, coming of age story!
Jun lives inside his head. He has a love of food, penguins, and a tendency towards indecision and anxiety. What will happen when a mysterious boy in his class takes a special interest in him? It's up to you in the interactive, visual novel, romance game.

Game Features:
-A Gallery with over 35+ Art to Unlock
-Beautiful Scenery, Backdrops, and Clips
-Music, Visuals, and Sound Effects
-A Cute Shounen-ai (BxB) Storyline
-NO in App Purchases & NO ads
-Hours of Gameplay, 2 Possible Endings & a Bonus?

content_descriptors.notes: This game does cover some heavy topics in the lives of the characters in hopes to help people relate with such unfortunate life circumstances such as health issues, school bullying/minor violence, physical parental abuse, and sexually suggestive situations but there are no explicit images or depictions. This game is meant to be a realistic take on life matters to highlight issues in our society that young adults face to help others relate and hopefully learn or cope vicariously through the characters and to not feel alone in their experiences.

Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6/ 10.7/ 10.8 upwards
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip; Storage: 500 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Help Jun, a self described "chronic over-thinker" make decisions at his new school with friends, conflicts, and romance in this Shounen-ai, anime style, coming of age story! This game offers a visual gallery with over 35 art to unlock, beautiful scenery, music, visual effects, and sound effects!
